Dr. Mesías Orozco-Ic

Position: Postdoc

Email: mesiorozco@gmail.com

Education

  • 2021: Ph.D. at the Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados (CINVESTAV-Mérida) in Mexico under the direction of Prof. Gabriel Merino. Part of his doctoral research (2019-2020) was conducted at the University of Helsinki, Finland under the co-direction of Prof. Dage Sundholm.
  • 2009: M.S. at the Centro de Investigación y de Estudios Avanzados (CINVESTAV-Mérida) in Mexico under the direction of Prof. Gabriel Merino.

Research Topics

  • Molecular magnetic response properties.
  • Three-dimensional aromaticity.
